entry.title: Eau Pour Garcon - Deodorizing Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Graydon
Type: Perfume
Price: 16.00

Eau Pour Garçon translates to "Water for Boys" and this spray is the non-toxic solution for keeping the men in your life smelling fresh. Whether sports clothes, gym bag, sneakers or locker, sometimes our guys need a little extra help. Spray it directly on the odored items to help clean and refresh, feeling good knowing that it is safe for skin contact as well. The active ingredients in this formulation are potent (but non-toxic) germ exterminators with an aroma that will appeal to everyone.

• 120 ml / 4.0 fl oz

• Gluten-free

• NO nut derived ingredients

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

aqua (purified water), ethanol (ethyl alcohol), hydrogen peroxide, *ricinus communis (castor) wax, cinnamomum cassia (cinnamon) leaf oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, eucalyptus globulus (eucalyptus) leaf oil, pelargonium graveolens flower (geranium) oil, juniperus communis fruit (juniper) oil, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, citrus limon (lemon) peel oil, cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, myristica fragrans (nutmeg) kernel oil, citrus paradisi (grapefruit) peel oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil *plant based

Directions

As a Body Deodorizer: 2-3 sprays over body will do the trick to smell fresh and clean. On your Stuff: Use on counter tops, gym/hockey bags, stinky shoes, and in your locker. On your Hands + Feet: Apply onto dirty, sticky hands and/or feet. Brush together lightly to let dry. Re-apply as needed.

entry.title: Neem Enamelizer Liquid
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Oral Hygiene Products
Price: 25.00

Neem Enamelizer is specially formulated to replace regular toothpaste. Maintaining oral alkalinity is essential for healthy mineralized enamel and Neem Enamelizer will leave your teeth feeling smooth while also further allow minerals, enzymes and nutrients in your saliva to re-mineralize the enamel. This alkalinizing liquid-polish is made with organic and wild-crafted ingredients: cinnamon, coconut oil, olive oil, jojoba, soapwort and spring water. Only one tiny drop is needed on a dry toothbrush!

• 100% Organic and Naturally Sourced

• 15 ml / 0.5 fl oz

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Spring Water, Soapwort, Coconut Oil, Saponified Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Neem, and Cinnamon.

Apply a small drop to a dry toothbrush and brush. Avoid while pregnant.

entry.title: Ozonated Healthy Gum Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Oral Hygiene Products
Price: 40.00

Living Libations' Ozonated Healthy Gum Gel is a fresh take on delivering tissue rejuvenation and microbe management to your oral ecology. Healthy Gum Gel delivers ozone, made of three atoms of oxygen (O3) to the gums. Nascent oxygen and essential oils are naturally antifungal, antibacterial & antiviral.

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Directions

Add a drop of Healthy Gum Drops to your salt water rinse for a whole mouth refresh. Swish the rinse, gargle and spit.
Add a drop to your tongue scraper. Rinse scraper with every use.
Add a drop to a dry toothbrush and gently brush gums.
Add a tiny drop to a dry, round-headed electric toothbrush and use it to polish teeth.
Add a drop directly to receding and bleeding gums.

entry.title: Bamboo Charcoal Cleansing Soap Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Herbivore Botanicals
Type: Soap Bar
Price: 12.00

Bamboo Charcoal has been used for centuries in the East. The Japanese use it regularly for everything, from filtering and purifying drinking water to brushing their teeth. When used in skincare, activated Bamboo Charcoal does wonders to deeply cleanse + detoxify. Drawing impurities and toxins from deep within your pores with its powerful absorption properties, it gives an amazing deep clean while also naturally exfoliating.

Bamboo Charcoal is gentle yet effective, and works especially well to clean and care for oily, combination, and blemish-prone skin types.

• All Natural + Organic Ingredients

• All of Herbivore's oils are cold-pressed or steam distilled, yielding premium-quality oils

• Cruelty free | Made in small batches in the USA

• 4 oz | 113 g

Ingredients

Saponified Oils of Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Elaeis guineensis (Sustainable Palm) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Kaolinite (White Clay), Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Citrus bergamia (Bergamot) Esssential Oil

Directions

Lather between hands with water, and apply generously to face and body. This soap is gentle enough to use every day.

entry.title: Kuro Charcoal Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Body Wash
Price: 25.00

Sort of Coal is a pioneering Danish company that specializes in producing beautiful and functional White Charcoal products that naturally purify the air, water and body. With White Charcoal as a central element in all of their products, they combine traditional Japanese craftsmanship with functional Danish design.

A black soap, with activated charcoal from pine leaves.  The activated coal is well-known for its ability to cleanse and to absorb impurities. The Kuro Soap is especially suited for normal/oily skin and can be used for the body as well.

Sort Of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

• Made with White Charcoal powder, which is the highest grade of charcoal available. The raw material used in Kuro Soap is Korean red pine leaves

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

• Made in Denmark

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Elaesis Guineensis Oil (Palm Oil), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Coconut Oil), Aqua, Sodium Hydroxide, white charcoal powder from red pine leaves.

Directions

Use as a face and/or body soap.

entry.title: Scullery Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hudson Made
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 18.00

Made from locally harvested, restorative and balancing ingredients like rose geranium oil, mineral salt, and all natural beeswax of the finest quality, this cleansing soap is perfectly suited for hands and forearms hard at work in the kitchen. Beeswax soap is a harder, longer lasting, tough soap that helps hands resist dryness and irritation caused by frequent washing. Leaves skin smooth and clean, ready to rustle up a meal or indulge in one.

Hudson Made’s scullery soap pays homage to the tradition of the homestead and works well on all of your rough spots. It’s a soap for anyone who possesses a multitudinous passion for the kitchen or a hard day’s work — and for whatever those efforts may yield.

• 5.5 oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Coconut Oil*, Olive Oil*, Palm Oil*, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium, Lime Essential Oil, Litsea Cubeba Essential Oil, Rose Geranium Essential Oil, Honey Absolute, White Kaolin Clay, White Bees Wax. *Organic

Vendor: Hudson Made

This small-batch, artisanal product is for the man (or woman) who understands that being good with your hands means being good to your hands. entry.title: Bath + Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: FIG+YARROW
Type: Body Oil
Price: 28.00 - 44.00 (4 variants)

F+Y Bath & Body Oil (Meadow) is a gorgeously aromatic and wonderfully emollient blend of skin-enhancing botanicals and floral essences in deeply nourishing oils for beautifying of skin and sense indulgence. The Woods scent option is a grounding and detoxifying arboraceous blend for all skin types; particularly helpful for those prone to body blemishes or skin in need of repair.

Woods  - Richly nutritive and detoxifying plant oils are infused with a blend of healing, nourishing and regenerative herbs to offer tremendous benefits to skin and underlying tissue. Pure essential oils further facilitate dermal decongestion and balance, while providing a uniquely woodsy, earthy and grounding scent.

Meadow  - Base oils of sweet almond, olive, pumpkin and grape offer a bounty of nutrients and emollient properties specifically formulated to readily absorb into skin and provide deep nourishment for enhanced appearance and overall improvement of the skin. The bouquet of herbs and essential oils offer healing benefits for damaged, maturing and under-nourished skin of all types.

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

MEADOW - oils of: Prunis dulcis (sweet almond) kernel*†, Olea europaea (olive) fruit*†, Cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) seed*†, Vitis vinifera (grape) seed*†; Matricaria recutita (chamomile) flower*, Lavendula angustifolia (lavender)*, Calendula officinalis (marigold) flower*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, essential oils of: Aniba rosaeodora (rosewood), Cananga odorata (ylang ylang), Lavendula angustifolia (lavender), Pelargonium graveolens (geranium).

WOODS - oils of: Cannabis sativa (hemp) seed*†, Olea europaea (olive) fruit*†, Vitis vinifera (grape) seed*†, Persea americana (avocado) seed*†; Achillea millefolium (yarrow)*, Symphytum officinale (comfrey)*, Equisetum arvense (horsetail)*, Calendula officinalis (calendula)*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, essential oils of: Cupressus sempervirens (cypress), Cedrus atlantica (atlas cedar), Juniperus communis (juniper), Vetiveria zizanioides (vetiver), Daucus carota (carrot) seed, Amyris balsamifera (amyris), Pogostemon cablin (patchouli). *certified organic †virgin

Directions

BODY massage into skin as a daily moisturizer, preferably while skin is still hydrated after bathing or after apply a full body mist.

BATH add a few pumps to warm bath; massage into skin; soak in nutritive and aromatherapeutic benefits. Though formulated with bath and post-bathing skin-moisturizing in mind, this oil is an excellent multi-tasker. Used also for: moisturizing hair packs to nourishing and remedy hair dryness, as a face oil cleanser followed by a steam towel, as well as an aromatherapeutically beauty-enhancing, skin-detoxifying and mood-calming massage oil.

The F+Y Foot Butter is a velvety-smooth, alpine-fresh whipped butter blend to treat and nourish feet. Show your gratitude to those stressed, calloused and endlessly devoted peds with this tingly, refreshing and antibacterial blend of essential oils in a highly nourishing base of hand-whipped organic shea butter and coconut oil.

Ingredients

Butyrospermum parkii (shea) nut butter*†, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*†, menthol*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, essential oils of: Abies alba (fir needle), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender), Melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree).*certified organic †virgin

Directions

Massage a small amount onto feet or other part of body in need of a refreshing and nourishing uplift.
